phrases: Damn, how could someone as graceful as myself have done that?
This is why I hate inferior animals.
It is actually a kitty, now that I look carefully.
Did you fall down like me?
How dare you call me a piglet?
In the first place, this is just a temporary form.
My true form is much more grand!
You are not injured at all.
No, no, I cannot stay with her.
I have to climb out of here right away.
Geez, this is why I hate human children.
You sort of... smell strongly of sake.
I am going to go change.
The recession is just as bad.
Touko-san said the shrimp in the fridge are gone.
You ate them, did not you?
I told you so many times not to bother the other people in this house.
It is got nothing to do with me.
Besides, do not make such a big fuss over one or thirteen shrimp, you ignorant boy!
This is the CD I borrowed from Nishimura.
What are you going to do about it?
It is your fault for leaving it there, idio-
I am tired of being with you!
Natsume, you damn punked-out, baldy, white asparagus!
Takashi-kun, I heard a big sound!
Natsume, you damn punked-out, baldy, white asparagus!
Still, that fat cat is a real bother.
He comes here every night and drinks like crazy.
And it is not just sake!
He is a bad drunk, too.
He goes wild after he drinks.
So, what are we going to do?
It is true that Natsume-dono is this Eight Field's savior,
but we need to watch out for that big-eating, tone-deaf, drunken cat.
There is a limit to how much we can take!
All right, for the peace of the Eight Fields,
we will make that big-eating, tone-deaf, drunken, old cat pay double!
For the peace of the Eight Fields, we will make that big-eating, tone-deaf, drunken, old cat pay double!
I eat thirteen shrimps from the fridge,
and I am bad with CDs!
Note: A, B sounds like ebi (shrimp) and C, D for CD.
That place is a den for ungrateful Ayakashi.
You should purify them so that they will not go wild.
Hey, what should we do after this?
Go home, we have got homework.
I have not seen that uniform before.
Hey, which school are you from?
Come with me for a bit.
I used a lot at the arcade.
Order another mixed pizza and a gratin.
You are still going to eat?
Are not you eating a bit too much?
Do not worry, eating a lot is good for you.
No, the problem is that it is not good for our wallets.
By the way, what is an arcade?
Thanks, I would like a pizza and gratin too.
Geez, what a waste of money.
We kind of want to go home now.
We sure caught a weird one.
I have not seen the cat today.
Do you know where he is, Takashi-kun?
I wonder if Nyankichi-kun is hungry?
He is always sitting imposingly on my seat.
It is kind of lonely without Nyangoro around, though.
It is kind of surprising Nyanko-sensei got so close to them.
Just keep on regretting it, kid.
Like heck I would go back to you now.
Here is the CD I borrowed.
The girl that ate everything on the menu from top to bottom.
She even made us go to the arcade with her.
She just would not let us go home.
And thanks to her, my allowance for this month is completely gone.
I do not know any girls like that.
She probably has the wrong person.
I do not have any female friends in the first place.
It is against school rules to go to the arcade on the way home from school.
But, well, it is kind of surprising.
So even you play games, Natsume-kun?
Well, it is healthier than going through the garbage in the mornings.
No, I am with my mom.
Yeah, we are going to a picnic tomorrow, after all.
So your mom and dad both got time off!
Maybe I will go tease Natsume's friends again.
Well, I heard that you cut ties with the human that holds the Book of Friends.
That has nothing to do with you.
Now that you are not related, you would not mind me taking the Book of Friends, right?
so do not come complaining to me later.
What is the meaning of this, Madara?
I will not let you pass.
You are attached to it, Madara.
You have come to desire the Book of Friends now?
Or... do not tell me you have come to like humans?
Anyway, I just cannot stand other Ayakashi stealing the Book of Friends.
Note: The cawing sound crows make sounds like stupid in Japanese.
You eat a lot for such a small cat.
Oh my, it is completely attached to you.
We will be keeping it while my friend is on his business trip for 2-3 days.
Sorry, but look after it for me.
Ah, look, it is like a ball of yarn.
Who cares about the Book of Friends!
This is not some freak show!
All right, let us sing a song!
Ah, the water from these rocks...
I know, I have some chocolate.
Here is half for you, kitty.
I was supposed to split it three ways with my mom and dad.
They said we could not go on a picnic again, so I went by myself.
Oh yeah, how about you come live with me, kitty?
We can eat meals and snacks together!
I am sure it is a lot more delicious than eating alone!
My mom said rabbits die if they get wet!
The kitty is going to die!
You said you wanted to go home, but I stopped you!
You even came to me, kitty!
But you are going to die!
They are weak, yet they care for others.
They have no powers, yet they desperately try to protect others.
It is all warm and fuzzy.
Sensei touched my mark and he became small!
Yes, it is the effect of the curse you picked up.
It is the five day mark curse.
You only have five days left to live, Natsume.
